version_description: - Bugs Fixed

- Bugs Fixed
- Simpler Revalidation Procedure
- TCASH TAP Feature Added
- Add Promotion Button
- Add BCA Bank Code

- Bugs Fixed
- New Improved Transaction History
- Optimized for iOS 10

*QR Code and 2D
Added new QR code and 2D barcode feature for token payment to simplify the transaction at the convenience stores.
*Update New Bank Codes
Added new bank codes for the transfer-to-bank feature
*Bugs fixed

**For security reason, user revalidation process is required

New Interface
New Features

Now you can buy Telkomsel DATA PACKAGES...
You can also buy many popular online games voucher like Steam and Garena.
Bug fixes.

Now you can buy Telkomsel DATA PACKAGES.
You can also buy many popular online games voucher like Steam and Garena.
Bug fixes.

Something exciting from Version 3.5.0 has arrived!

It's actually not 'something', though. It's a lot of things.

You can now ~easily, seamlessly, effortlessly~ #PakeLinkAja to:

- Pay for transports only by doing easy, peasy steps
- Buy roaming plans for a pleasant overseas trip
- Buy various types of insurance for extra protection, anywhere anytime
- Top up Electronic Money Card directly from the app

Do you think that doing these now is easy enough? Trust me. Doing all of the above is way easier with LinkAja.

Also, for those who are still stuck with the Basic Service account: let's upgrade your account to Full Service and enjoy LinkAja to the fullest. Simple steps, for numerous benefits - with our newest, simpler e-KYC.

And oh, we have also improved our services for a better experience. We always, regularly do this. For you. Only. <3

Make sure you update and enjoy the new features!

- Special promo for LinkAja app users

Pengen bisa rasain semua keriaan di TCASH, sekarang kamu bisa langsung upgrade akun TCASH di aplikasi. Akses menu pengaturan di profile kamu dan upgrade akun TCASH langsung dari hape Kamu dengan layanan verifikasi terdepan dan pertama autentikasi video call.

Beli pulsa dan data semakin mudah dengan pilihan pulsa dan data yang semakin beragam di TCASH.

Akhir bulan saatnya bayar-bayar tagihan. Bayar langsung tagihan kamu #pakeTCASH dengan pilihan penyedia tagihan yang lengkap.

Perbaikan dan penyempurnaan aplikasi juga agar lebih nyaman dan aman untuk semua kebutuhan pembayaran Kamu.

Semua #pakeTCASH gampang

Now all telco subscribers in Indonesia can apply to be TCASH user and enjoy TCASH services through TCASH Wallet app

-. Bug Fixes & peformance improvements
-. Push notification enhancement
-. Order TCASH TAP Sticker on Apps
-. Customer Contact Info for Non Telkomsel Provider

Now all telco subscribers in Indonesia can apply to be TCASH user and enjoy TCASH services through TCASH Wallet app
-. Available to read (SNAP) National QR with GPN Logos
-. Bonus Balance TCASH Remaining Status.

version_name: 3.4.0!Ditch the word ‘complicated’ every time you need to top up your LinkAja account – we have a great news for you

version_description:
WHAT'S NEW ON APPS:
- Service & performance improvements

A new feature is born in Version 3.4.0!

Ditch the word ‘complicated’ every time you need to top up your LinkAja account – we have a great news for you, and it is called ‘Wallet’.

- Linking your Debit Card to your LinkAja’s Wallet as sources of funds is now possible! Every transaction you make will be auto-debited to your linked cards
- Easily move your physical wallet to LinkAja for a better #Cashless experience. A smartphone is all you need!

Something exciting from Version 3.5.0 has arrived!

It's actually not 'something', though. It's a lot of things.

You can now ~easily, seamlessly, effortlessly~ #PakeLinkAja to:

- Pay for transports only by doing easy, peasy steps
- Buy roaming plans for a pleasant overseas trip
- Buy various types of insurance for extra protection, anywhere anytime
- Top up Electronic Money Card directly from the app

Do you think that doing these now is easy enough? Trust me. Doing all of the above is way easier with LinkAja.

Also, for those who are still stuck with the Basic Service account: let's upgrade your account to Full Service and enjoy LinkAja to the fullest. Simple steps, for numerous benefits - with our newest, simpler e-KYC.

And oh, we have also improved our services for a better experience. We always, regularly do this. For you. Only. <3

Make sure you update and enjoy the new features!

It's actually not 'something', though. It's a lot of things.

- Buy roaming plans for a pleasant overseas trip
- Buy various types of insurance for extra protection, anywhere anytime
- Top up Electronic Money Card directly from the app

Do you think that doing these now is easy enough? Trust me. Doing all of the above is way easier with LinkAja.

Also, for those who are still stuck with the Basic Service account: let's upgrade your account to Full Service and enjoy LinkAja to the fullest. Simple steps, for numerous benefits - with our newest, simpler e-KYC.

And oh, we have also improved our services for a better experience. We always, regularly do this. For you. Only. <3

Make sure you update and enjoy the new features!

Anyone’s up for something ~totally~ new?

Because LinkAja 4.0 is here! With a fresh, brand new feeling. Different, but in a really better way.

For a smoother experience of buying things, paying bills, topping up your electronic money card, paying for transports - everything. <3

Psst, a new source of fund is ready for you too! A special one where you can make a transaction now, but pay for it later. What can be better?!

Update now to get that new, fresh feelings we promised!

Psst, let us tell you that,

- Buy things now and pay for it later
- Use your smartphone to pay for KRL
- Invest professionally yet easily

are ALL possible in LinkAja 4.1!

Don't miss out. Update now.

Enhancement
/en'hansmənt/
(n.)
an increase or improvement in quality, value, or extent.

As the dictionary has explained above, this is what LinkAja 4.3 offers you.

Not only one, two, but a lot of it!

Wanna know which part of the app that's enhanced?

Update now.

(PS: we still love you. That's why all bugs have been repelled too <3)

Let's take a moment of silence and pray for the strength that we all need to fight this Covid-19 pandemic.

Regardless of this terrible event, we still have a good news to share!

A lot of features have been improved and we got rid of all annoying bugs so you could still #PakeLinkAja seamlessly while social distancing. This news does put a little smile on your face, doesn't it? :">

Don't forget to update to 4.4!

And pretty pretty please: stay safe, stay hydrated, stay healthy. <3

Do you know what ~we~ do while you fight all those germs? We fight too. Not only germs, but also: bugs!

We love you this much so we make sure that your experience on #PakeLinkAja during this hard time is unbothered with all the nasty bugs.

A quite reasonable reason to update your LinkAja app to version 4.5, yes?

Update now! And please: don't forget to wash your hands with soap for 20 seconds and stay healthy! <3

An appreciation post dedicatedly written for all the front liners out there - be it doctors, janitors, security officers and everyone involved: you guys rock!

We promise to keep doing all our activities #dirumahaja. We will make sure the lights never go off and the internet connection is always stable by paying all the bills #PakeLinkAja. Hehe.

Do everything #PakeLinkAja while #dirumahaja is all possible! Plus - the app is now enhanced so you will be happy to use it. <3

Update now?

An appreciation post dedicatedly written for all the front liners out there - be it doctors, janitors, security officers and everyone involved: you guys rock!

We promise to keep doing all our activities #dirumahaja. We will make sure the lights never go off and the internet connection is always stable by paying all the bills #PakeLinkAja. Hehe.

Do everything #PakeLinkAja while #dirumahaja is all possible! Plus - the app is now enhanced so you will be happy to use it. <3

Update now?

We know Hari Raya has passed by, but we still owe every single one of you an apology for...

...all those terrible days when we let those irritating bugs come and annoy you.

It's bad, we know. But they are gone by now, though, so would you please forgive us and give some smile to show?

Update. Update. Update to 4.7!

To every single one of you who still fight this pandemic hard since day one, we have your presents ready:

New menus where you can search & find
1. cool online events to make yourselves productive while being #dirumahaja
2. fresh daily needs from the nearest market, so you can shop while still being #dirumahaja

Sounds fun, right?!

Psst, they're only available in LinkAja 4.8. So, update now?

#PakeLinkAja

We would like to introduce you to LinkAja! An exciting, hassle-free financial services app that offers you a convenient and secure way to pay your daily needs.

There are actually a lot of things that you can do using LinkAja. Here they are:

- Pay with QR and Token
Seamless and super fast, you will only need to snap the merchant's QR or show your own Token to them to make payments.

- Transfer and Cash Out anytime, anywhere you want
Send money to a phone number or bank account? Sure! Need cash? Simply visit the nearest ATMs - BTN, BNI, Bank Mandiri or BRI to cash out. Easily without cards!

- Buy and Pay this or that
Buy pulsa-data to insurances, pay electricity, PDAM to Internet billings. All possible #PakeLinkAja.

- Going here and there #PakeLinkAja
Roam the city easily without having to worry about cash by using LinkAja to pay for your taxi and train ride! Need to go somewhere further? Buy plane tickets using LinkAja is now possible too!

- Simpler without wallet
Easily 'link' your physical wallet to LinkAja for a better #Cashless experience. Need your electronic money topped up? #PakeLinkAja and get it done without having to go to the ATMs!

- Make transactions now, pay for it later
Shop and buy anything you want without having to worry. Because anything you buy, anytime you buy it - you don't have to pay for it now!

- Shop and invest with LinkAja
No time for pulling yourself back from investing! Because LinkAja is now here to help you invest like a pro. In an easy, safe place.

What are you waiting for? #PakeLinkAja now!


For security reasons, this application cannot be used on rooted devices.

All 'easy accesses' are here.

And have been well-prepared for every single one of you.

But, do you know what 'easy access' that makes it special on this version?

Yup - Layanan Syariah LinkAja!

It's now easier to find, easier to activate.

Update now to 4.10?

Do you know the best way to kill bugs?

Besides making your home smell wonderful, peppermint oil is believed to naturally repel them.

But wait, have you heard of LinkAja's developer team?

All bugs that live here at LinkAja are so afraid of them, they're gone at the moment they step in. The best one we have to get rid of all the bugs!

Prove it yourself by updating to 4.11.

Save your time by updating your LinkAja app to its newest version,

and enjoy the speedy experience of buying and paying with LinkAja!

Buy data, electricity token, pay bills - everything is now faster, better in LinkAja 4.12.

Oh, bugs have also been repelled. Another reason for you to update!

Update now?

Being #dirumahaja forces us to do everything online. But, guess what?

Virtually attending an event,
Buy fresh foods from pasar online,
Checkout the goods from e-commerce shopping cart,

All can be paid with LinkAja. Because we're simply #LengkapnyaUntukSemua.

Psst, make sure your electricity bills has been paid and data package has been purchased (with LinkAja) to make all those above into reality.

And update to 4.13, please?

Here we are, at the 2020 finish line.
Though the year was unpredictable, let's finish it with a smile.

The start of 2021 is right around the corner.
We hope this year's lesson will make us even stronger!

And here is the newly updated version,
With the exact same mission,
To help you in the right direction.

Because no lights and no internet connection on Christmas & new year's eve won't be good, right?
And that's when LinkAja comes as a knight

So, update to 4.14 now?

Roses are red,
violets are blue.
Our app is getting improved,
because we care about you!

As an act to show how deep is our love to you,
here we present the 'sweetened' version of LinkAja with all the bugs repelled.

We let the bugs bid a forever goodbye to you,
So you would be impressed!

Ready to experience the sweetness of LinkAja's newest version by clicking 'update' up above?

We knew your desire to eat snacks increases since you work from home,
And we did something for it.

Enjoy LinkAja as the new source of fund in your favorite food delivery apps!
So now it's easier to order, easier to pay.

Stay at home, stay healthy, and eat a lot of good food by ordering it through 'ojek online' apps and pay for it with LinkAja!

Update now?
